resources.string:
"How to protect yourself from getting dengue fever

" "• You can protect yourself against dengue fever by taking the following precautions:
" "• Prevent mosquito breeding inside and outside your home
" "• Avoid visiting areas prone to mosquitoes
" "• Wear long-sleeves and long pants to cover your arms and legs. Dark colored clothes can attract mosquitoes a lot. So, use clothes that are light in color.
" "• Use mosquito nets while sleeping.

" "You can take the following precautions to protect your home from mosquitoes:

" "• Use insecticide sprays in dark corners (under the bed, sofa and behind curtains) and burn repellent oils inside your home
" "• Turn over all water storage containers when empty and store them under a shelter
" "• Cover bamboo pole holders when not in use
" "• Loosen soil in potted plants to prevent accumulation of stagnant water on surface
" "• Clear fallen leaves and stagnant water in scupper drains and in the garden
" "• Clear any stagnant water in air cooler units
" "• Clear blockages in roof gutters
" "• Light Camphor in your room it acts as a brilliant repellent
" "• Keep the environment clean
" "• Avoid crowded places the more the people, the more the concentration of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere and higher the chances of instigating the odour senses of mosquitoes.
" "• Turn over empty pails and buckets so that they do not collect excess water.
" "• Cover the buckets and drums that are used for storing water.
" "• Clean out all empty flower pots.
" "• Repair broken septic tanks and cover vent pipes with wire mesh if any.
" "• Keep the dustbins clean; do not let any dirt get collected to avoid mosquitoes.
"
